job_tasks.phrase: design compiler optimizations, focusing on hardware-aware transformations for In-Memory Computing
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to designing and optimizing aspects of a compiler, which is a core component in preparing and running AI models, especially when considering hardware performance. While not direct model training, it's about enabling efficient model execution.

job_tasks.phrase: ensure our compiler supports workloads beyond classical CNNs (e.g. generative AI)
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions supporting generative AI workloads, which is a form of modeling, and improving the compiler's capability to handle these.

job_tasks.phrase: Lead the design, architecture, and hands-on development of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler and SDK.
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the core software engineering activities of designing, architecting, and developing a compiler and its associated Software Development Kit.

job_tasks.phrase: Execute and technically guide complex projects
job_tasks.justification: This involves managing and guiding the execution of technical projects, which is a software development management aspect.

job_tasks.phrase: optimizing the Axelera software stack for scalability and performance
job_tasks.justification: This describes improving the overall software system for better performance and scalability, a key software development concern.
This implies managing and ensuring the smooth operation and effectiveness of the compilation process, which can be seen as a specialized pipeline in the AI development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: propose changes to ensure best-in-class functional coverage, performance and accuracy
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a focus on improving the operational aspects of the compiler by ensuring it meets high standards for functionality, performance, and accuracy, akin to MLOps principles for model quality.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure best practices in the team, especially regarding testing methodologies for compilers
job_tasks.justification: This points to establishing and enforcing best practices for testing, which is a critical part of ensuring the reliability and quality of software, particularly in MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Your work will shape Axelera AI's software systems and extend beyond your immediate team, with a focus on delivering scalable, flexible solutions to advance our AI platform.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the strategic impact of the role, focusing on advancing the company's AI platform and delivering solutions that have a broad effect, indicating an understanding of business goals.

soft_skills.phrase: partner to your manager and peers
propose changes to ensure best-in-class functional coverage, performance and accuracy
Mentor and guide junior and senior engineers
modeling a standard of excellence and leadership within the team

classification.rationale: The role focuses heavily on compiler development, optimizations, and ensuring support for various AI workloads including generative AI. While it touches on software development and operations, the core seems to be enabling efficient model execution and performance through deep technical understanding of the compilation process.
